attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned would ask you to honour our motion.

 Kevin Pieterson MBE is a loyal servant of this county.

 He has won the Ashes on three occcasions and the 20/20 world cup,

 But despite that some people think he is not "British" enough.

 So let us show a man with a English mother who is proud to play for England an is English. Let us show him that actions speak louder than words and that his actions have wrought new joys from an ancient art.


 Let us ask for Kevin Pietersen to be reinstated to the England Cricket Team.
